member.name: M:ACE.BIT.ADEV.Finance.Financial.GetPayment(System.Decimal,System.Int32,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Returns the payment amount for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
member.param: The interest rate per payment period. For example, if the rate is an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and the customer makes monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1 / 12, or 0.0083.
The total number of payment periods in the loan term. For example, if payments are made monthly on a four term, the loan has a total of 4 Ã— 12 (or 48) payment periods.
The present value (or lump sum) that a series of payments to be paid in the future is worth now. For example, when a customer finances a vehicle, the loan amount is the present value.
member.returns: The payment amount for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.
member.exception: Thrown when is less than 0 or greater than 1, the is less than or equal to zero, or the is less than or equal to zero.
